data.name: Gloria Victis - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get this DLC to earn special in-game title for your character. Forge your eternal fame!

You will also receive 300 Amber currency - Ambers can be spent on items like reskill/restat/nation change!

You will also receive two exclusive documents created with dedication to our players: Awakening of the World and the Song of Creation. These text, based on the unique and immersive Gloria Victis lore, will give you a firsthand look at the beliefs of two of three nations inhabiting the game’s world: proud and honorable knights of the Kingdom of Midland and furious, vengeful Ismir raiders from the frosty North. Learn about the everlasting powers each of these factions pray to before entering a battle and how they shaped the world in the beginnings of time. Don’t wait – get immersed now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Athlon II X4 with at least 2,5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD4870 - at least 1GB GPU memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game requirements may change in time (optimization)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Phenom II X4 with at least 2,7 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon HD 7870 - at least 2GB GPU memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game requirements may change in time (optimization)
